long story

skip to short

I’m from Bangkok, Thailand and have lived in Brisbane since 2013.

I’m a UIX Designer with front-end development skills. I aim to be a UIX Engineer in the future with my skill sets.


My passion for creativity alongside the hunger to solve problems have led me to become the bridge between design and frontend development. I’m more focused on Design today but with my agility, I am able to pick up other skill sets when required.


I believe that learning is important and no matter the circumstances, as long as there is knowledge gained, nothing is lost.


I aim to have a purpose towards what I do and in my career and the future, by finding solutions to problems and to help those that are incapable of helping themselves with technology and innovative solutions and designs.
